Question: By the end of the summer, this person had persuaded Wayne Shorter to leave Art Blakey's Jazz Messengers and join the quintet.
Hints: While in Paris, this person began a relationship with French actress and singer Juliette Gréco.
This person received the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award in 1990.
Before leaving Prestige, however, this person had to fulfill his obligations during two days of recording sessions in 1956.
